Name: A Hora Incomparável
Ingredients: 40 ml Strucchi Rosso Vermouth infused with peanut
Instructions: Place a large chunk of ice in the glass. Add soda, Campari and the peanut-infused vermouth. STIR briefly.
History: Created by Fabio La Pietra, Brasil for Campari.
Nutrition: One serving of A Hora Incomparável contains 180 calories
Garnish: Half dehydrated grapefruit slice & lemon zest twist
